```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
ces <- read.csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

### Data visualization 
```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex()+
  labs(x = "White Population (Percent)",
         y= "CES 3.0 Score",
       title = "Relationship Between % White Population and the Aggregate CalEnviroScreen (CES 3.0) Score") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "navy", high = "orange") +
  theme_minimal()
```
